Title: Relates to the Catskill off-track betting corporation providing licensing and financing to the Monticello racetrack
Summary: Relates to the Catskill off-track betting corporation providing licensing and financing to the Monticello racetrack and the ability to provide capital improvements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the Catskill off-track betting corporation providing licensing and financing to the Monticello racetrack
